flawed_nl_solution:
Ellen takes 4*3=<<4*3=12>>12 hours in total to rise all balls of dough.
It will take 4*2=<<4*2=8>>8 more hours to bake each one.
It will take her 12+8=<<12+8=18>>18 hours to make all of the bread.
#### 18

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
